name: Ocean Rescue (Tim Ferbeek)
description:
Ocean Rescue is a game about filling a rescue quota,  rescue shipwrecks to fill the quota all while dodging enemy mines that when in range, will lock onto you. if you fail to fill the quota in time, you take damage. If you get hit by a mine, you (obviously) take damage. You run out of health, you die.

To move around, press the spacebar with appropriate timing to create a wave, pushing you in the opposite direction.

Ocean Rescue is in development & will receive future updates. Some bugs may appear.
